price: (Nuko Musa anaga inkoni hasi maze ihinduka inzoka nini, imiragura ibyo bari bakoze) abarozi bitura hasi barubama, baravuga bati “Twemeye Nyagasani wa Haruna na Musa.”
arabic: فَأُلۡقِيَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ سُجَّدٗا قَالُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا بِرَبِّ هَٰرُونَ وَمُوسَىٰ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: fa-ul'qiya al-saḥaratu sujjadan qālū āmannā birabbi hārūna wamūsā
